data: About six o’clock on an evening in the early part of a recent November, the drowsy quiet sometimes pervading police headquarters was rudely broken by the precipitate entrance of a young man, who made his way hurriedly to the door marked, in neat gilt letters, “CHIEF OF POLICE.”
The silver blade: The true chronicle of a double mystery
browsing: crime/mystery|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: crime, thrillers and mystery|category: novels
